PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04392018-04-20,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Part J of the Food and Drug Regulations (Temporary Accelerated Scheduling)
PrecisRegulations Amending PART J OF THE FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (Temporary Accelerated Scheduling) in order to facilitate access to temporarily controlled substances, grant the Minister the authority to add, by order, to the schedule to Part J of the Food and Drug Regulations (FDR), temporarily controlled substances listed in Schedule V to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act. The Minister is also granted the authority to remove, by order, such a substance from the schedule in Part J of the FDR.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0085 Publication Date: 2018-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
